name: Barber
description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
second_night_dec: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.
